devdoc.details: This contract must NEVER hold funds!Maliciously crafted transaction payloads could wipe out any funds left here

callWithSyncFee(address,bytes,address,ui.details: This is the most straightforward use case, and `transfer` handles token payments.

params._feeToken: Payment can be done in native and ERC-20 tokens
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

sponsorAuthCallWith1Balance((uint256,add.details: Payment is handled with off-chain accounting using Gelato's 1Balance system

params._call: Relay call data packed into SponsorAuthCall struct
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

userAuthCallWith1Balance((uint256,addres.details: Payment is handled with off-chain accounting using Gelato's 1Balance systemThe userNonce abstraction does not support multiple calls (call concurrency)Apps that need concurrent user calls will need to implement multi-callingon their end via encoding into _call.data.

params._call: Relay call data packed into UserAuthCall struct
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

userSponsorAuthCallWith1Balance((uint256.details: Payment is handled with off-chain accounting using Gelato's 1Balance systemThe userNonce abstraction does not support multiple calls (call concurrency)Apps that need concurrent user calls will need to implement multi-callingon their end via encoding into _call.data.

params._call: Relay call data packed into UserSponsorAuthCall struct
params._taskId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato

devdoc.title: Gelato Relay contract

callWithSyncFee(address,bytes,address,ui.notice: Relay call with Synchronous PaymentThe target contract pays Gelato during the call forward

sponsorAuthCallWith1Balance((uint256,add.notice: Relay call + One Balance payment - with sponsor authenticationSponsor signature allows for payment via sponsor's 1Balance balanceOracle value for exchange rate between native tokens and fee token

userAuthCallWith1Balance((uint256,addres.notice: Relay call + One Balance payment - with ONLY user authentication.The user here is paying for themselves, no external sponsorUser signature allows for payment via user's 1Balance balanceOracle value for exchange rate between native tokens and fee token

userSponsorAuthCallWith1Balance((uint256.notice: Relay call + One Balance payment - with BOTH sponsor and user authenticationBoth sponsor and user signature allows for payment via sponsor's 1Balance balance

userdoc.notice: This contract deals with synchronous payments and Gelato 1Balance payments
